channel.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
channel.description: can any1 gimee a pretty cool link to a server that can hold almost 80 ppl? And any1 recomend a cool pk server ishould get?

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

If you did edit it to be a 80 ppl server it would lag like the end of the world. And you would get spammed in your server console like ALOT.

Read full topic

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“RuneRemix, post:31, topic:143198”]sorry to break it to you guys but its not all about the server…if you have a dedicated it is but if your hosting from home its about bandwidth…upload and download speed =|
the better your server is the less ram and cpu power you need but you still need a good ass connection to hold 60+[/quote]
And yet, you continue to post on a thread that has been dug.

Read full topic

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

sorry to break it to you guys but its not all about the server…if you have a dedicated it is but if your hosting from home its about bandwidth…upload and download speed =|
the better your server is the less ram and cpu power you need but you still need a good ass connection to hold 60+

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @Xile1 Xile_
item.description:
@Xile1 wrote:

[quote=“Sin_, post:25, topic:143198”][quote author=Xile_ link=topic=196427.msg1756534#msg1756534 date=1189817148]
Dodian is off Reenscape 1.4 - and if you want the maxplayers 80

just go into Player.java and chaneg the maxplayers = #; # = number of players
[/quote]

No…

The server calls on the server.java when it is starting up and thats about it. And the best possible source is the source without as much activity in it, it all depends on how many NPCs you have, the global objects… etc. etc…

Npcs don’t really make it lag
NpcHandler is a good one to fix[/quote]

/wrist /fail

Dodian is off reenscape 1.4 - NPCS make it lagg IF you have like 700 + cause the server bases are crappy.

Read full topic

just go into Player.java and chaneg the maxplayers = #; # = number of players[/quote]

No…

Snark:

The server calls on the server.java when it is starting up and thats about it. And the best possible source is the source without as much activity in it, it all depends on how many NPCs you have, the global objects… etc. etc…

Npcs don’t really make it lag
NpcHandler is a good one to fix

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

[quote=“Mrquarter, post:8, topic:143198”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=196427.msg1755991#msg1755991 date=1189795955]

m server holds 100 easy.

Do not spam.

Servers by defualt hold 200 people, depends if you got a decent computer. My Laptop holds 63 people then it will crash.

Your wrong. Normal computers hold 20-30 then it lags. Dedicateds can hold about 200.

On Godsfantasy I had 80 online with a normal pc.
Just a small lag
[/quote]
Well then Iki, you have a super computer.
Oh wait, mine old held 30 because it was 1 gig ram. My laptop can hold about 80-100 with 2 gigs. Ima get 4 soon maybe.[/quote]

Dont spam? lol you tell people not to then you go do it…

Read full topic

item.title: A server that can hold 80 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:19, topic:143198”][quote author=Sin_ link=topic=196427.msg1756513#msg1756513 date=1189816427]

can any1 gimee a pretty cool link to a server that can hold almost 80 ppl? And any1 recomend a cool pk server ishould get?

lol you can edit it to make max players 80 but it would be one laggy server
here what to do open up server.java then in there search for maxconnections then change that

not really…
dodian has 200+ ppl online everyday…
its literly lag free

Because the source is really good, Winten did his own programming in it. Plus, their host helps with an awsome source.

Eclipse, it doesn’t depend all on ram, if your source is shit, it’s going to run like shit.

Actually Dodian is WhiteScape/P16 4.5. It is ran by a $250 dedicated and MySQL. K?
[/quote]

You sure? If so, then people lied to me :.[/quote]

Haha sucks for you. Wolf told me its off P16 4.5

Read full topic
